description:
This course teaches you how to use ON1 Photo 10, where you'll learn all of the basic (and some advanced) features of this powerful image editing program used by amateurs and professionals alike.

For many photographers, once they learn ON1 Photo 10 they rarely - if at all - need to use Photoshop anymore. It is easier to learn, easier to use, and with this course in you'll be up and running with ON1 Photo 10 where you'll be producing photos you never thought were possible.

In this course you'll learn almost every important feature of ON1 Photo starting with the basics and continuing through some more advanced techniques and enhancements. This class is ideal for beginners as well as those who may already have a little experience with ON1 Photos but want to get a firm grasp on all the major features and techniques.
title: ON1 Photo for Photographers
